channel.title: Vegan Recipe Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Vegan Recipe Blog

item.title: About this blog
item.description: This is a vegan recipe blog, featuring recipes that I have created, learned from friends, or modified from the Internet. Rarely featuring simply unreal vegan creations from establishments around North America. And no long blog text before the recipes! I have another website that contains some of my math/software projects. It is completely different from vegan recipes.

item.title: Easy Vegan Pho
item.description: Ingredients Broth Vegetable broth (8 cups) Water (2-3 cups) 1 yellow onion 4-6 garlic cloves 1 thumb length ginger Spinach Garam masala* Turmeric Soy sauce Chili oil Food items Sesame Oil Wide rice noodles Shiitake mushrooms Tofu Garnishes Bean sprouts Thai red chili peppers Thai basil Green onion Directions My experience wound up being relatively straightforward, but I’d recommend reading through all the steps once before begining, so you know where you can multitask and where you cannot.
